A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Do not understand all these positive reviews. Very poorly developed story arc\, horrible interpretation of star wars cannon. An amalgam of  amazing cinematography and CG effects but 0 substance. SO disappointing. With the budget and talent behind this it felt mailed in. Only reason it is making money was the massive pent up demand from a huge fan base that ran; like us to the theatres with the promise of something amazing and we all ended up with coal for Christmas. ?? What did we do Disney Santa to deserve being ripped of like this?
